name: The Golden Bear
copy: This design is all about the resilience of California to overcome difficult situations and come out stronger than before. It’s a flip of the UNC Tarheel mascot with added elements like the California poppy.
author: Kevin, Designer at Elephant

name: The Poppy Bear
copy: This design is inspired by the quote ‘grow through what you go through’ and represents the strength of Californians and how we will continue to thrive, regardless of what knocks us down.
author: Alyssa, Designer at Elephant
